name: R3-request-status-for-R4B
title: Cross-version VS for R3.RequestStatus for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version ValueSet represents concepts from http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/request-status|3.0.2 for use in FHIR R4B. Concepts not present here have direct `equivalent` mappings crossing all versions from R3 to R4B.
